RESTRICTED_COMMANDS_NO_GAMES.en: {0} can play any game, but cannot use the following commands: {1}.
RESTRICTED_COMMANDS_NO_GAMES.ro: {0} poate participa la orice joc, dar nu poate folosi comenzile următoare: {1}.

RESTRICTED_GAMES_NO_COMMANDS.en: {0} can use all of the commands, but cannot play the following games: {1}.
RESTRICTED_GAMES_NO_COMMANDS.ro: {0} poate folosi orice comandă, dar nu poate participa la jocurile următoare: {1}.

RESTRICTED_COMMANDS_AND_GAMES.en: {0} neither can use the following commands: {1} nor play these games: {2}.
RESTRICTED_COMMANDS_AND_GAMES.ro: {0} nu poate folosi comenzile următoare: {1} şi nici nu poate participa la jocurile: {2}.

RESTRICTED_COMMANDS_NO_GAMES_FOR_YOU.en: {0}, you can play any game, but you cannot use the following commands: {1}.
RESTRICTED_COMMANDS_NO_GAMES_FOR_YOU.ro: {0}, poţi participa la orice joc, dar nu poţi folosi comenzile următoare: {1}.

RESTRICTED_GAMES_NO_COMMANDS_FOR_YOU.en: {0}, you can use all of the commands, but you cannot play the following games: {1}.
RESTRICTED_GAMES_NO_COMMANDS_FOR_YOU.ro: {0}, poţi folosi orice comandă, dar nu poţi participa la jocurile următoare: {1}.

RESTRICTED_COMMANDS_AND_GAMES_FOR_YOU.en: {0}, you neither can use the following commands: {1} nor play these games: {2}.
RESTRICTED_COMMANDS_AND_GAMES_FOR_YOU.ro: {0}, nu poţi folosi comenzile următoare: {1} şi nici nu poţi participa la jocurile: {2}.

NO_RESTRICTIONS_FOR_YOU.en: There are no restrictions for you, {0}.
NO_RESTRICTIONS_FOR_YOU.ro: Nu există nicio restricţie pentru tine, {0}.
